settings.title: Rooted in Real Stories
settings.text: Scents by Sara is built with its community, not just for it. Each piece carries real stories and shared experiences, turning both gifting and self-use into something deeply personal.

settings.title: Handcrafted & Customisable
settings.text: From form to final detail, each piece is hand-poured in small batches and thoughtfully finished to be intentionally one of a kind.

settings.title: Scent Science
settings.text: Fragrance designed as a tool for daily ritual and to be used with intention. More than decorative, every scent serves a purpose.

settings.title: Sustainable Throughout
settings.text: Every element, from wax to packaging, is consciously chosen to be vegan, cruelty-free and environmentally considered without compromise on quality or design.

settings.heading:
INTENTIONAL DESIGN IN
SCENT AND FORM.

settings.title: THE LIVED-IN BODY COLLECTION
settings.text: Designed to celebrate the body as a holder of memory and confidence. Here, gold leaf is applied with intention to transform scars into something seen and treasured.

settings.title: THE SCULPTED COLLECTION
settings.text: Celebrating the female form through gold leaf adornment, elevating its natural curves and contours. Honouring every body shape, tone, and texture in all its glory.

settings.heading:
GROUNDED IN RITUAL.
EMBODIED IN CONFIDENCE.
settings.text: Born in London and raised in Dubai, Scents by Sara is a female-founded premium fragrance brand that brings together embodied confidence, intentional scent and personal ritual, shaped by community and real stories.

settings.quote: I knew that the candles looked amazing, but I didn't expect them to smell as amazing too! Scents By Sara really gives the full package. I'm hesitating to light mine because then the magic ends.
settings.author: EUNICE YUMBA

settings.quote: Absolutely stunning pieces that instantly elevated my living room. The scent throw even when unlit is incredible. A true work of art.
settings.author: SARAH JENNINGS

settings.quote: The attention to detail is unmatched. I gifted this to my sister and she was brought to tears by the beautiful intention behind the sculpted design.
settings.author: MICHELLE D.
